features: SUPERFOOD MASK -- ANAI RUI green tea clay mask is rich in superfoods, such as Avocado, Green Tea, Kaolin,and Shea Butter extracts. Organic & Natural, leaves you feel hydrate, smooth skin.

DEEP CLEANSING MASK -- Avocado mask for deep pore cleansing with Kaolin clay, works to lift away dead skin cells and impurities, pore dirties, excessive oils, improve the looks of pores, blackhead, dry skin.

MOISTURIZING MASK-- The facial mud mask riches in Avocado Fruit Oil, Shea Butter, Green Tea Extracts, those organic antioxidanth protect your skin from oxidative damage, lock in moisture, overall improve skin to radiant.

BEST WAY TO USE -- Apply the avocado mask on face or back, wait for 15-20 minutes, that rinse off with warm water. Follow with a toner or moisturizer, you will feel refreshed, moisturized and deeply cleansed skin.
ORGANIC & FOR ALL SKIN- With herbal and natural bases with high-performance scientific ingredients, Great for oily skin and acne-prone skin. Not tested on animal, no SLS, Paraben Free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ANAi RUi Pure & Natural Avocado & Green Tea Clay Mask for Moisturizing Skin Skincare avocado clay masks are made from avocado and other natural ingredients such as Aloe, Shea Butter and Cucumber, combining clay with avocado creates a nourishing and hydrating mask that cleanses and detoxifies the skin while providing moisture and nutrients.

Avocado clay mask helps to soothe and moisturize dry, dull skin, helps to absorb excess oil and impurities from the skin, leaving it feeling deeply cleansed and refreshed. ANAi RUi facial clay mask also good for helping to unclog pores and can be helpful for reducing the appearance of acne.

Avocado Extract is work for deeply moisturize and nourish the skin. Green Tea Extract works to reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and to improve the overall look and feel of the skin. Kaolin helps to absorb excess oil and impurities from the skin. Aloe helps to helps to smooth & hydrate dry skin.

What's main plant ingredients on avocado clay mask? The main natural plant ingredients on avocado clay mask is avocado extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Shea Butter, Cucumber Fruit Extract etc., Avocado mask works as nourishing and hydrating mask that cleanses and detoxifies the skin. How to use this avocado facial mask? Applying the mixture to your face and let it sit for 10-15 minutes before rinsing off with warm water. It is important to follow the instructions carefully when using a clay product to avoid over-drying or irritating the skin. I have sensitive and oily skin, Does this clay mask work for? Will it be cause redness or acne? We suggest applying few clay mask on forehead to test allergies. As our clay mask is made by natural plant ingredients, there is currently no customer feedback regarding any allergic reactions. Avocado mask is warm & soothe mask, will not cause acne. I have acne & pores skin, will this green tea & avocado clay mask work for it? Yes, our avocado clay mask has Kaolin & Clay helps to absorb excess oil and impurities from the skin and helps to unclog pores and can be helpful for reducing the appearance of acne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instant brightening effect + SAFETY SEAL & Application SPATULA❤️
reviews.reviewText: I am 40 yo and few years back started getting dark spots on my face. There are several factors to consider, I had 2 kids and moved to tropical climate couple years back. Some of my dark spots (forehead) showed up during my pregnancy and never went away while other (upper cheek) appeared probably due to increased sun exposure. We have sun year round and coming from a completely different climate, I learned the hard lesson about the sun, sunspots and suncream. While I no longer leave my home without SPF on my face I still have a few dark spots I am battling. Vit E is must in skincare products and Vit C is proven to detoxify and brighten the skin. This clay mask has both of these to me important ingredients as well as turmeric which is precious ingredient that reduces inflammation, detox and brighten. The mask goes on easily, it dries a little when you leave it on the face so it’s best to wash the face after application. Some people like to remove using pads and wipes but this is not the mask to do that. Also, slightly warm water is best way to use when washing off the face product. This mask works great and I really want to try their rose version just because I am crazy about the rose scent. After just one application my skin was brighter, not just the dark spots, I mean overall my entire face was a shade brighter! I can see this product being a part of going out routine on the days/nights you’re trying to look your best. My dark spots are still there but little brighter which I consider amazing results! I can’t wait to use it more and hopefully completely get rid of dark spots! Overall packaging is superb. Even the carton box is well made and has a smooth finish. The best part is it includes the spatula so you don’t have to dig your fingers inside AND it comes with the safety lid underneath the regular lid. Now, that’s how you properly seal beauty product! THANK YOU!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a good mask, but nothing more.
reviews.reviewText: I decided to do a bit of an experiment and use the mask for 20 mins once a day for 2 weeks. I used it every morning after cleansing because I use a retinoid at night. I would not recommend doing this with a new product just because you never know how it will react with your skin. For me, it was a chance I was willing to take.I think the mask is generally harmless. I am currently struggling with adult acne and I am dealing with a lot of redness and hyperpigmentation. The mask will not treat active break outs, I suspect that it could potentially be more irritating if you have active breakouts with sensitive skin. So I would recommended using it once active breakouts have been treated. After using it I do see a glow and my face generally feels very nice. I did not deal with irritation at any point, which was great because it is why I was originally hesitant to try the mask.It was very easy to apply it to my face, it spread like butter with the spatula. I would recommend using it on mostly dry skin. When you wash it off, the water is orange because of the turmeric. It doesn’t stain at all (I am a POC and i have olive skin), but I would still wipe your sink after using it to clean up the residue. Despite it being a clay mask, the mask was not overly tightening. I have used the Aztec clay mask before and that mask can get very tight when it dries, which I found to be more irritating. This one is much more tolerable.Personally I do not see myself repurchasing this product simply because it doesn’t really *wow* me. With the current state of my skin, it doesn’t stand out as a product. I rather invest in a mask that gears more towards hydration than brightening. Perhaps if someone who was dealing with just a few pimples and dark spots and/or has generally clear skin were to use this product then the results might be more notable. Otherwise, it really just is a mask to do if you want to indulge in self-care or want a temporary glow. I think the reviews that insinuate that this mask is miraculous in some way can be a bit misleading. Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) is extremely unstable so you really don’t get much of its benefits in products like these.Perhaps if I use it longer I could see better results. I am considering continuing the usage of the mask but reducing it to 2-3 times a week. I use topicals with actives and I don’t want to do too much on my skin. I plan on finishing the product.Bottom line: This is a good mask in that the ingredients are generally not irritating and it is something to do if you’re looking for a temporary glow. It will not transform your skin and it will not get rid of your hyperpigmentation and/or redness. I would not recommend this to a friend and I wouldn’t buy it again simply because the results weren’t remarkable. I rather spend my money on something else. However, if someone were to gift me this or I happen to have another jar of it then I wouldn’t mind using it again for funsies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could Not Be More Pleased
reviews.reviewText: I am a 76 year old lady who at this time has a good deal of facial hyperpigmentation. I grew up in the era where you wash your face with soap and water and moisturize. That is it ! I'm not saying it was right; but I have always had beautiful skin. I have no immune system, and between my age and all the meds I take on a daily basis, I look terrible. Trust me the days of the Pandemic Covid with wearing a mask and my big sunglasses was a blessing.This is the best facial mask I have ever used. It is not harsh, and I am only sorry I did not take before and after pictures. My face is glowing. Don't think about purchasing it...DO IT !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this product. You can tell the jar I received had been sitting for a while. Nexus that, I have sensitive skin and this works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second time buying this mask
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I’ve bought this turmeric mask. I really enjoy it once a week I noticed that my skin is feeling more refreshed and clear. I really enjoy this mask it’s not overpowering, and there is no massive odor to it. It sits on for about 20 minutes and then I remove it. I would definitely recommend and I’ll continue to buy this mask.

Pros:- Nice earthy smell and nice green coloring.- Creamy in texture and goes on the skin quite smoothly leaving a cool sensation on the face.- Leaves my skin very soft, clear and hydrated without feeling too oily.- Helped to diminish the appearance of dark circles.Cons:- Hard to remove. I found it was easiest to rinse my face in the shower.- The plastic applicator is really uncomfortable to use and doesn't spread the product evenly across the face.- Little pricey.
Pour une première utilisation je suis satisfaite du résultat sur ma peau

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have not used this mask for too long, however I can see that it leaves skin very soft and clean. It is easy to apply and to rinse off. It appears to be quite good for sensitive skin.

Ich hatte die ANAiRUi Gesichtsmaske - Kurkuma Vitamin C Maske, diese war schon sehr angenehm.Die Rosenmaske finde ich noch angenehmer, der Rosenduft und die Konsistenz ist ein wenig weicher.Mit einem feuchten Lappen abnehmen ohne zu zerren klappt bei beiden Masken.Eine schone saubere durchblutet Haut ist das Resultat.Trotz meiner 64 Jahre habe ich Unterlagerungen, die so wie verschwunden sind.Ich empfinde die Rosenmaske als reichhaltig, Inhaltsstoffe sehr gut.Vielen Dank!
Con diferencia la mejor mascarilla que he usado.La uso una vez por semana, justo para el fin de semana y deja la piel con un efecto lifting y una luz impresionanteMe encanta, lo recomiendo 100x100
